Package org.ldaptive

Class LdapException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.ldaptive.LdapException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbandonOperationException, ConnectException, FilterParseException, PoolException, SchemaParseException
    public class LdapException
extends Exception
    Base exception for all ldap related exceptions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
